name: Last Days of Humanity
description:
'''Last Days of Humanity''' is a Dutch [[goregrind]] band From [[North Brabant]], [[Netherlands]]. They were active from 1989 until 2006, released three studio albums from 1996 to 2006, and then reformed in 2010. Their music is known for its nonstop sound and relentless [[blast beat]]s, with regards to drummer Marc Palmen.

The band has been recognized as one of the most notable grind acts in the [[Music of the Netherlands|Dutch music]] scene, and one of the most well known goregrind bands ever.
